verse_content.Sanskrit:
न च तस्मान्मनुष्येषु कश्चिन्मे प्रियकृत्तमः ।
भविता न च मे तस्मादन्यः प्रियतरो भुवि ॥ ६९ ॥
verse_content.Transliteration:
na ca tasmān manuṣyeșu
kaścin me priya-kṛttamah
bhavitā na ca me tasmād
anyaḥ priyatarah bhuvi
verse_content.Word_by_word: na—never; ca—and; tasmāt—therefore; manuşyeșu—among mankind; kaścit —anyone; me—My; priya-kṛttamah—more dear; bhavitā—will become; na— no; ca—and; me—My; tasmāt—than him; anyah—other; priyatarah—dearer; bhuvi—in this world.
verse_content.Translation: There is no servant in this world more dear to Me than he, nor will there ever be one more dear.
